empty.title: No Submissions Found
empty.description: No submissions have been found for this form.

endpoint.title: Your Form Endpoint
endpoint.description: This is the unique API URL for your form, you will be sending your form data to this URL.

guide.title: Setup guide
guide.description: Follow our step by step examples to build and collect form submissions from your front-end code

step-1.title: Change your form action attribute to your endpoint
step-1.description: Set your form action to [{{url}}] and method to [{{method}}]

step-2.title: Give a name attribute to each form field
step-2.description: Inputs, textareas, checkboxes, radios all form elements need to have a form attribute like [name="example"]

step-3.title: Your form is ready
step-3.description: Try the code below to send some test submission.

form.title: Form for Demo
form.description: This form will send submission to your url to see if it works.

support.title: Documentation, Help and Support
support.description: Integrate Form into your Product using the official SDKs. Discover the available libraries.
